channel.title: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit
channel.description: Hello First Real posting if i put in wrong place please move or tell me ill replace but what i was wondering about was i want to connect to my deltabase 317 with the moparscape 3.2 or 4 so i can read the item & obj ids and get everything set so so any info would be helpful and appreciated

item.title: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit
item.dc:creator: @pitchblac23 pitchblac23
item.description:
@pitchblac23 wrote:

i do agree with the optimal organizing of the source files but im use to the old “server folder” - “client.java” not “server folder” - “scr” - “folder” - “client.java” lol but i have looked over the rs2 protocol and i have looked and dled free pdfs on java but for me its not sinking in for working with the rsps i know its all java but from all the tuts on java and rsps and minecraft i have used and worked with all the code seems to differ with game to tut so im trying my best to learn as i go i know its probably the hardest and stupidest way about doing it but thats just me

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit

item.title: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Packaging makes no difference on how hard a server is to programing.

Think of packaging as a organized way to have all your file in one folder. The one folder being src, and then all your classes should be organized in a way that makes thing easy to find, but is also informative enough that a person that hasn’t programed it will be able to figure it out.

If I may suggest, you should read more on the basics of Java and also the rs2 protocol it will help you greatly in creating anything you wish in your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit

item.title: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit
item.dc:creator: @pitchblac23 pitchblac23
item.description:
@pitchblac23 wrote:

hm idk i know this base is very messy i may rid of it for another what i was going to do with it was a basic remake but not a public remake but just a lan type thing with like 5-6 friends and thought delta would be pretty easy to use but im finding out its pretty crappy i have used devo longgg time ago and coded it with ease but i cant find a good unpacked devo and suggestions on ether a new source or trying to fix this problem

if it is the fact of mopars client loading the headicons defferent then i guess i could work around it but i have looked up uid adding and removed what they wanted added in server still nothing i have also removed lol almost all the login code and still wont connect the source i have has the uid rsa and encryption im not sure about any of it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit

item.title: Need help with uid REMOVAL or edit
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If I remember correctly Deltascape doesn’t load the head icons the way the moparscape client sends them, which is why you get problems with the updating of the player…

Read full topic
